report.sql-kpi: select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, (select co_name,co_gid, co_parent_gid, co_oc_id,co_mr_gid,co_object_instance from utp_common_objects where co_oc_id=812 union (select 'Anchored WBTS', 0 co_gid,co_gid co_parent_gid, #rh_old_parent_anch# 812 co_oc_id,-1,'---' from utp_common_objects where co_oc_id=811) ) wbts #tmp_meas_tables# where #if# !@withRehoming wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and #fi# rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #if# @withRehoming (#first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid != 0 or (#first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid=0 and rnc.co_gid = wbts.co_parent_gid)) and #fi# plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #if# !@withRehoming wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and #fi# plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

object-conf.report:
AXC name AXC_GID 2,1,3 PLMN NAME,RNC NAME,WBTS NAME,WBTS ID select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(axc.co_name, 'NN('||axc.co_gid||')')"AXC name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects axc #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and axc.co_oc_id=804 and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and axc.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.axc_gid = axc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#
/>

report.charts-processor: PLMN NAME,RNC NAME,WBTS ID,WBTS NAME,WCEL ID
report.sql-kpi:
select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(wcel.co_name, 'NN('||wcel.co_gid||')')"WCEL name", wcel.co_object_instance "WCEL ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, (select co_name,co_gid, co_parent_gid, co_oc_id,co_mr_gid,co_object_instance from utp_common_objects where co_oc_id=812 union (select 'Anchored WBTS',0 co_gid,co_gid co_parent_gid ,#rh_old_parent_anch# 812 co_oc_id,-1,'---' from utp_common_objects where co_oc_id=811) ) wbts, (select co_name,co_parent_gid, co_gid,co_oc_id,co_mr_gid,co_object_instance from utp_common_objects where co_oc_id=813 union (select 'Anchored WCEL' co_name,0 co_parent_gid, 0 co_gid,#rh_old_parent_anch# 813 co_oc_id,-1,'---' from dual)) wcel #tmp_meas_tables# where
rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #if# !@withRehoming wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #fi# plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and wcel.co_oc_id=813 and #if# @withRehoming (#first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid != 0 or (#first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid=0 and rnc.co_gid = wbts.co_parent_gid)) and (#first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid != 0 or (#first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid=0 and wbts.co_gid = wcel.co_parent_gid)) and #fi# #first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid = wcel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid=wbts.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

report.charts-processor: PLMN NAME,RNC NAME,WBTS ID,WBTS NAME,WCEL ID
report.sql-kpi:
select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(wcel.co_name, 'NN('||wcel.co_gid||')')"WCEL name", wcel.co_object_instance "WCEL ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects wcel
#tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #if# !@withRehoming wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #fi# plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and wcel.co_oc_id=813 and #first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid = wcel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid=wbts.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", decode(#first_tmp_table#.utype_id,'2','OMU','268','MXU','271','NIS1P','284','NPGE','285','NPGEP','286','NPS1','287','NPS1P','301','NIU','324','A2SP','325','NIP1','326','NIS1','327','RSMU','329','ICSU','330','GTPU','331','DMPG','337','SFU','1484','A2SU','1485','SET','1486','PET','1488','DMCU',#first_tmp_table#.utype_id) "Unit Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')') "RWBTS name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 AND wbts.co_oc_id=812 AND rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid= rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rwb_id=wbts.co_object_instance and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# UNION ALL select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", 'not_known' "RWBTS name", #keys#, #kpis# FROM utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc #tmp_meas_tables# WHERE plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and rnc.co_gid=#first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rwb_id = 'not_known' #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')') "RWBTS name", #keys#, #first_tmp_table#.intface "Interface", #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 AND wbts.co_oc_id=812 AND rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid= rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rwb_id=wbts.co_object_instance and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# UNION ALL select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", 'not_known' "RWBTS name", #keys#, #first_tmp_table#.intface "Interface", #kpis# FROM utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc #tmp_meas_tables# WHERE plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and rnc.co_gid=#first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rwb_id = 'not_known' #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')') "RWBTS name", #keys#, #first_tmp_table#.transport "Transport", #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 AND wbts.co_oc_id=812 AND rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #if# !@withRehoming wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and #fi# #first_tmp_table#.rwb_id=wbts.co_object_instance and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')') "RNC name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid = rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and rnc.co_oc_id=811 and wbts.co_oc_id=812 and #first_tmp_table#.wbts_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.rnc_gid=rnc.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(wcel.co_name, 'NN('||wcel.co_gid||')')"WCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects wcel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid = wcel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(wcel.co_name, 'NN('||wcel.co_gid||')')"WCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects wcel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid = wcel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(rnc.co_name, 'NN('||rnc.co_gid||')')"RNC name", nvl(wbts.co_name, 'NN('||wbts.co_gid||')')"WBTS name", wbts.co_object_instance "WBTS ID", nvl(wcel.co_name, 'NN('||wcel.co_gid||')')"WCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects wcel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.wcel_gid = wcel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#
select #id_pivot#, #kpis# from dual #tmp_meas_tables# where 1=1 #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

group.name: PLMN/WS_AXC
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id AND la_object_class=804

group.name: PLMN/WS_RNC
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id AND la_object_class=811

group.name: PLMN/WS_WCEL
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg, utp_legacy pleg, utp_legacy gleg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id AND leg.la_object_class=813 AND leg.la_parent_int_id = pleg.la_int_id AND pleg.la_object_class=812 AND pleg.la_parent_int_id = gleg.la_int_id AND gleg.la_object_class=811

group.name: PLMN/WS_WBTS
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg, utp_legacy pleg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id AND leg.la_object_class=812 AND leg.la_parent_int_id = pleg.la_int_id AND pleg.la_object_class=811

group.name: PLMN/MR_RNC
group.sql: select decode(nvl(mr.co_name,'nn ('||mr.co_gid||')'),' ','NN ('||mr.co_gid||')',nvl(mr.co_name,'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')) mr, o.co_gid ws_gid from utp_common_objects mr, utp_common_objects o where o.co_oc_id=811 and o.co_mr_gid=mr.co_gid and mr.co_oc_id=109 and mr.co_gid<>0 and mr.co_gid is not null

group.name: PLMN/MR_WBTS
group.sql: select decode(nvl(mr.co_name,'nn ('||mr.co_gid||')'),' ','NN ('||mr.co_gid||')',nvl(mr.co_name,'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')) mr, o.co_gid ws_gid from utp_common_objects mr, utp_common_objects o where o.co_oc_id=812 and o.co_mr_gid=mr.co_gid and mr.co_oc_id=109 and mr.co_gid<>0 and mr.co_gid is not null

group.name: PLMN/MR_WCEL
group.sql: select decode(nvl(mr.co_name,'nn ('||mr.co_gid||')'),' ','NN ('||mr.co_gid||')',nvl(mr.co_name,'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')) mr, o.co_gid ws_gid from utp_common_objects mr, utp_common_objects o where o.co_oc_id=813 and o.co_mr_gid=mr.co_gid and mr.co_oc_id=109 and mr.co_gid<>0 and mr.co_gid is not null

group.name: PLMN/MR_AXC
group.sql: select decode(nvl(mr.co_name,'nn ('||mr.co_gid||')'),' ','NN ('||mr.co_gid||')',nvl(mr.co_name,'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')) mr, o.co_gid ws_gid from utp_common_objects mr, utp_common_objects o where o.co_oc_id=804 and o.co_mr_gid=mr.co_gid and mr.co_oc_id=109 and mr.co_gid<>0 and mr.co_gid is not null
